html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-09982018-06-29
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - Research Officers and Research Council Officers ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder Approving that the National Research Council of Canada ENTER into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA that Covers all employees in the Research Officers and Research Council Officers Bargaining Unit for the period beginning on July 20, 2014 and ending on July 19, 2018 and is on the same terms and conditions as the previous collective agreement, except for the changes set out in the summary of changes.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
